import './index.scss' import { Loader } from 'react-loaders' import AnimatedLetters from '../AnimatedLetters' import { useEffect, useState, useRef } from 'react' import emailjs from '@emailjs/browser' const Contact = () => { const [letterClass, setLetterClass] = useState('text-animate') const refForm = useRef() useEffect(() => { setTimeout(() => { return setLetterClass('text-animate-hover') }, 3000) }, []) const sendEmail = (e) => { e.preventDefault() emailjs.sendForm('service_nr68lob', 'template_def99xp', refForm.current, 'M8yxbLp1QpnvSWLOj').then( () => { alert('Message successfully sent!') window.location.reload(false) }, () => { alert('Failed to send message, please try again.') } ) } return ( <>

Text here

) } export default Contact
